title: Exploring AI chatbot UTAUT in teachers: A quantitative study
abstract: This study examines the facilitating conditions of deep learning technology in professors contexts. Using a survey of 627 participants, we applied structural equation modeling to test an extended TAM framework. Results indicate that social influence significantly predicts adoption. Implications for professors policy and practice are discussed.
authors: Silva, O.; Weber, Z.; Kim, O.; Tanaka, Y.; Liu, D.
keywords: undergraduate; faculty; intention to use; acceptance
